column27: Portland police say a man was found shot to death on a high school track.

column24: Victim shot while walking around track at school football field
column27: 16YOF shot in the ankle while walking around the track at the school football field at 5:00 AM. Suspect fired multiple shots and then fled the scene. The suspect did not know the shooter. Unidentified suspect in custody.

column24: Two teens shot outside gym during open basketball practice; shooter fled; shooter and suspects had planned meeting just prior to shooting
column27:
17YOM shot 2 teens outside of school gym during weekend open basketball practice during illegal drug deal. Shooter fled and was later arrested. Two injured victims met the shooter in a secluded area near the gym before the shooting. Appeared targeted. The boy shot in the chest told an officer that Conat “tried robbing us” and “took our money,” according to court records. 

Shooter had researched online how to rob drug dealers and was charged in two other related cases.

column24: Attempted robbery in school parking lot, gun jammed when shooter fired, victim ran over shooter with car
column27: 2 minors attempted to rob the victim in the parking lot. Minors were selling a cellphone and robbed the suspect. Shooter had a gun during the robbery and pulled the trigger but the gun jammed. The shooter tried to flee, the victim ran over the shooter while trying to catch up to him. The victim got out of the car and kicked the gun out of the shooter's hand. Police came and found drugs on the shooter. The second minor surrendered and refused that he knew the shooter brought a gun.

column24: Victim shot in vehicle and crashed into school building
column27: Victim was shot in vehicle and crashed into school building

column24: Two construction contractors shot by coworker during argument at school
column27: Two construction contractors shot at school by coworker during argument that escalated into shooting. Shooter fled, attempted a carjacking at a nearby car wash, fired shots without striking anyone, fled the area, and carjacked another vehicle at gunpoint. Abandoned vehicle and was at large until arrested in front of a house (somehow connected to shooter). No kids at school or school grounds at the time.

column24: Shots fired during large fight between teens
column27: Police were called to the area for a large fight between teens. Upon arrival, they found the victim lying in the school parking lot suffering from a gunshot wound. Police performed CPR until paramedics arrived - victim was later pronounced dead at the hospital. two suspects arrested - information not available via media reports.

column22: Unknown if Subdued Surrendered or Fled
column24: Shot fired during argument behind the school
column27: Shooter - Ronald Thompson - was arguing with another man in the school parking lot behind the high school when he fired a round from his handgun into the ground to scare the other man. Thompson was arrested and charged with wanton endangerment.

column24: Man found dead from GSW in vehicle outside of school
column27: 18YOM found dead from a gunshot wound in a crashed vehicle outside of the school.

column24: Man found dead in vehicle in school parking lot (GSW)
column27: 19YOM was found shot in a car in the school parking lot.

column24: 4 shots fired during fight at football game under bleachers
column27: 2 adult males shot during fight between a group of males under the bleachers during the football game. Students fled the stadium and game was stopped. Suspect and motive unknown.

column24: Two students from rival school and former student shot after football game
column27: Two students from the rival high school and a former student of the school where the shooting occured where shot by an unknown gunman outside of the football stadium after the game. Metal detectors were used for screening all fan and 50 police officers were assigned to the game. Police reported the shooting occured after a prior fight between the shooter and victims.

column24: Gang related shooting outside stadium gate prior to football game, 30-50 shots fired, game cancelled
column27: 30-50 shots were fired between gang members outside of the stadium gate prior to the football game. The game was cancelled.
column36: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column24: Shooting outside of school, school locked down
column27: 7 shots fired during gang related shooting outside of middle school. School was locked down and students were released 90 minutes later in batches. Gunman fled. Victim was critically injured and not identified (teen, unclear if student).

column24: Adult male found shot dead outside of school, killed by school janitor
column27: Adult male shot to death at 10pm during domestic dispute. School was closed the next day out of caution. Police said the shooting was targeted and they had identified a suspect. School janitor arrested in another state on 8/30 and charged with murder.

column24: Woman shot at in parking lot by ex-boyfriend while dropping off child
column27: 34YOM fired multiple shots at ex-girlfriend while she was dropping off child at school and was in her car. School was locked down. All shots missed the target and no one was injured. One of the shots hit a nearby residence. Shooter fled the scene and was arrested later that day after a standoff at a private residence. Had previous felony charges against him and may receive federal weapons charges.

column24: Two non-student teens shot at during drive-by outside of school
column27: Two 17YOM non-students were shot at by an unknown shooter in a vehicle outside of the school. One teen was injured. Both ran into the school to take shelter. Police received reports of an active shooter at the school and the school was locked down. Parents rushed to the school when a school shooting was reported. No description of suspect.

column24: Shooter was a student who attempted to shoot the teacher in class
column27: A 12YOM student pointed a handgun gun at the teacher in the middle of class, and pulled the trigger but the safety was on and the weapon did not go off. The teacher disarmed the shooter and he was arrested.

column2: Luisa Pineiro Fuentes School of Science and Discovery
column24: Non-student killed during argument outside of school (closed for holiday)
column27: 34YOM was shot by unknown gunman during argument outside of school. School was closed for Labor Day and there was a cook-out block party.

column24: Shots during fight outside school
column27: Three juveniles were arguing in front of the school, one of them discharged a handgun and killed a juvenile bystander, student of another school. Juveniles involved fled the scene. Shortly after, police responded to another crime scene, where the shooter allegedly shot himself accidentally in the thigh, while fleeing the crime scene. Suspect claimed he was shot from a drive-by car but the nature of the wound did not corroborate the report. Police found a revolver and a short nearby. He was arrested and charged, witnesses confirmed shooter's identity. Shooter was allegedly a member of the Hanover Boyz street gang and had been caught multiple times with weapons on school grounds, including a BB gun and a knife.

column24: Officer shot a vehicle driving recklessly on football field
column27: Officer fired at a vehicle driving recklessly around football field during youth football tournament. No injuries. Driver was a former police officer, had made 911 calls, and was allegedly involved in the kidnapping of a woman.  He was arrested, no known connection to the school.

column24: Shooter in ski mask got out of vehicle and fired multiple shots at three students leaving school
column27: Three students were shot in targeted shooting outside of school at dismissal. Shooter in ski mask got out of car and fired at the students then fled the area. Two of the injured students took refuge in the cafeteria. Police have two suspects in custody but not charges announced.

column24: Three shots were fired a school bus, 15YOF student injured
column27: 3 shots were fired at school bus by unknown shooter. 15YOF was injured. No suspect or motive.

column24: Student shot on baseball field during altercation
column27: 18YOM (student) was shot and killed on the baseball field after school during an altercation with an unidentified shooter who he had an ongoing dispute with. School was locked down. Police said the shooting was targeted. 500 students were at the school at the time of the shooting. 30-40 were interviewed as witnesses.

column24: Two students had gun at bus stop, one shot fired, went to school, school locked down until gun was located
column27: Two students had gun at bus stop. One shot was fired. No one was hit or injured. Student then took the gun to school. When school officials became aware of the gun on campus, the school was locked down until the shooter was located. Lockdown alert was sent to parents who rushed to the school. No injuries.

column24: Shots fired in parking lot during football game, stadium evacuated
column27: 5-6 shots were fired during a fight in the parking lot of the school during a football game with rival school. 200 people in the stadium heard the shots and evacuated. Authorities described chaotic scene. No injuries or shooter located.

column22: Unknown if Subdued Surrendered or Fled
column24: Student showing gun off in gym class, accidental discharge
column27: 2nd grade student was showing off a gun to another student during gym class. The gun accidentally discharged striking the student in the hand. The school was locked down and alerts were sent to parents. Police located the firearm within minutes. Parents rushed to the school. Police chief said the shooting was an accident and no other students were in danger.

column24: Shooting at fast food restaurant directly across from school, student and employee struck ran back to school
column27: School employee and a student were stuck when shots were fired in a large group outside a fast food restaurant across the street from the school. Victims returned to the school building where they were treated by first responders. School was locked down. Police later arrested 18YOM and 20YOM.

column24: Multiple shots fired at vehicle after child was dropped off
column27: Unknown shooter fired multiple shots at vehicle in the school parking lot after child was dropped off. All of the shots missed. School was locked down. No injuries. Shooter fled. Police said the shooting was targeted.

column24: Student killed in cross fire of shooting outside of school
column27: 17YOF student was shot (crossfire) outside of school during a shoot out between 2 unknown shooters. Two different caliber of rounds were found. Student was taken to nurses office. No suspects identified.

column22: Unknown if Subdued Surrendered or Fled
column24: Two students playing with gun in school bathroom.
column27: Two unnamed students fired a gun in the school bathroom. School was locked down for 4 hours then dismissed.

column24: Adult male shot in chest at football game during argument
column27: 47YOM (shooter) fired in the parking lot following an argument with 31YOM (victim) in the stands during the JV football game. Shooter was arrested at the scene. Police determined the shooting to be self defense.

column24: 6 bullets stuck the school building, no injuries
column27: 6 bullets stuck the school building. No injuries. Police said the shooting was unrelated to the school. No suspect arrested.

column24: Adult male victim shot by another adult male infront of school during domestic dispute
column27: 26YOM shot adult male victim during domestic dispute outside of elementary while children were being dropped off. One shot was fired. Shooter fled the scene and was later arrested. Injured victim went into the school for assistance. School was locked down.

column24: Parent's gun discharged in cafeteria while picking up daughter
column27: Unidentified female parent accidentally discharged a handgun in her bag in the school cafeteria while picking up her child. No injuries. Woman left before police arrived.

column24: Two victims shot in school parking lot during football game
column27: 16YOM shooter shot 2 victims in the parking lot of the school during the football game. One victim shot the in back (target) other shot in foot (random). Shooter subdued and disarmed by a bystander at the scene.

column24: Shots fired during fight after football game in school parking lot
column27: Shots fired by unknown shooter in parking lot of school following football game during a fight. Shooter fled the scene. Victim in a vehicle that was struck by shot was injured.

column24: Drive-by shooting in school parking lot
column27: Two men shot in the parking lot of the school (one fatal, one grazed, third person in car was uninjured and fled). Shots fired by an unknown suspect inside a vehicle with to occupants who fled the scene. School was not in session due to fall break.

column24: Unknown shooter fired pellet gun at students and teacher from the tree line near the school
column27: Unknown shooter fired pellet gun at students on the play ground from the tree line near the school. A teacher was struck and injured. Police responded but the unidentified shooter fled.

column24: Student shot at on school property, shots missed
column27: 15YOM student was shot at on school property. All shots missed. The shooter fled. Police arrested 3 suspects in a vehicle related to the shooting.

column24: Escalated fight the previous day involving multiple students
column27: Two 16YOM students were fighting in front of the cafeteria in a crowded hallway and one of them pulled out a gun (stolen from a car) and shot the other. The victim died later at the hospital. An SRO was in the cafeteria, gave the victim first aid, apprehended the suspect, and seized the gun. The police had covered the scene in 10 minutes. Shooter and victim were involved in fight the day prior (multiple students, one had a knife). Police said bullying was not involved.

column24: Two men in their 20s shot outside of school by unknown shooter
column27: Two men in their 20's were shot outside of the elementary school by an unknown gunman. Motive unknown.

column24: Student fired bb gun at other student in classroom
column27: 12YOM pulled out BB gun in classroom, pointed it at multiple students, and then fired at a 13YOM student. 13YOM student did not have injuries from the BB. Shooter was given juvenile summons and BB was taken by police.

column24: Shot during robbery outside of school
column27: Two adult males shot an unidentified adult male during a robbery outside of the school after hours. Two adult male shooters were involved in multiple crimes in the area.
column38: Esteban Nieto Oseguera, Ernesto Alonso Solis

column24: Parent's concealed weapon discharged striking other parent
column27: 29YOM parent had concealed handgun. Gun discharged and another parent was struck by richochet. Shooter fled and was later arrested by police. Shooting occured just prior to dismissal. Students were still in classrooms and school was locked down.

column24: Adult male fired BB gun and broke multiple windows at the school
column27: 22YOM fired BB gun at multiple windows of the school causing $3,000 in property damage. Motive unknown. School was not in session for Thanksgiving break.

column24: Man shot during argument following pick-up football game
column27: 21YOM was shot during argument following pick-up football game on the football field of the school. School was not in session (Thanksgiving). Gun was flashed during the game and the shooting occurred after the game had concluded. Shooter fled the area in vehicle before police arrived.

column24: 17YOM shot outside of school building
column27: 17YOM (Latino) shot outside of school building. School was not in session (Thanksgiving). Three young males (black) were seen running from the area following the shooting.

column24: Stray bullet broke window of school, school locked down
column27: Bullet broke window of school. No injuries to students inside. School was locked down. Police do not believe the school was targeted (stray shot). Two other shootings were reported in the neighborhood near the school the same afternoon.

column24: 20YOM and 15YOF shot with pellet gun in parking lot of school
column27: 20YOM and 15YOF were shot by a pellet gun in the parking lot of the high school. Shooter and victims fled the area. 20YOM was shot in eye and transported to hospital. Building sustained property damage.

column24: 14YOM planned attack on the school but was confronted by police on-scene thanks to a tip
column27: 14YOM, former student of a school in the district, planned to shoot up the school. Police were tipped off and schools in the area were put in lockdown before shooter and police arrived. Police went straight to the school and found suspect who allegedly shot out the glass of a locked entry door to the fire but he shot himself dead shortly after.
column36: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column24: Student fired gun into air in parking lot. School locked down.
column27: Student fired gun into the air in the school parking lot during dismissal. The students still in the school were locked down. Shooter fled the area/ No injuries reported.

column24: 17YOM high school student shot in elementary school parking lot
column27: 17YOM varsity athlete shot and killed in elementary school parking lot. Shooter fled the scene. Shooting occurred at night when the school was closed. School was closed following day while police searched for shooter in the neighborhood.

column24: Parent with gun shot by police following custody dispute
column27: Police responded to school for custody dispute involving an adult male. While escorting the parent from the school, he pulled a handgun and was fatally shot by police officers. School was locked down for 3 hours.

column24: Non-student shot at female in parking lot, school locked down
column27: 19YOM non-student fired shot at female inside vehicle in the school parking lot during a domestic dispute. 3 children were inside the vehicle. Armed suspect fled. School was locked down.

column24: Shots fired from vehicles in the school parking lot. No students injured.
column27: Shots fired from stolen vehicle at another vehicle in the school parking lot during the school day. Multiple shooters involved. No students were injured. Police said it was unknown if the occupants of the vehicle were students.

column24: School bus hit by stray bullet injuring driver
column27: School bus occupied by 15 students was struck by stray bullet injuring the bus driver. Occupants of two nearby cars were firing at each other when the bus was struck.

column24: Two teens shot in parking lot during robbery
column27: 16YOM and 15YOM shot in parking lot of the school during a robbery. School was closed at the time of the shooting. Unidentified suspect fled.

column24: Adult male who was shot was found by SRO in the parking lot
column27: Adult male who was shot was dropped off in the school parking lot by an adult female. SRO found the victim and rendered first aid. School was locked down while police investigated. Large police response to school. Police determined that the shooting did not occur on school property.

column24: Shots fired at bus in school parking lot by 5 teens in stolen car.
column27: Shot were fired breaking windows of a school bus in the school parking lot at the start of the school day. School was locked down. Shot were fired by 5 teens in a stolen car. Teens were also involved in carjacking, fired at bystander, and firing at police officer. Two realistic BB guns were recovered from vehicle. Four teens were arrested, one was charged with prior homicide.

column24: 2 shot during altercation outside of basketball game, shooter fled
column27: 17YOM and 20YOM shot during dispute in the school parking lot during a basketball game. Police said one was not a student and did not identify the other victim. Shooter fled the scene.

column24: Adult shot while trying to stop man from breaking into his car in school parking lot
column27: Adult male was running on the school track when he saw another man attempting to break into his car. When he attempted to stop the robbery, the man shot him and fled the scene. A basketball game was taking place in the school during the shooting.

column24: Student shot by other student during drug deal behind school
column27: 16YOM student shot 2 during a drug deal behind the school cafeteria. Two other students were involved and fled the scene. 80 students were at the school for after school activities at the time of the shooting. School was locked down.

column24: Bus driver shot on school bus during road rage incident
column27: School bus driver was shot on school bus by other driver involved in a crash. One student was on the bus. Police said it was a road rage incident. Shooter was arrested immediately after the shooting by a nearby police officer.

column24: Hall monitor shot by armed intruder looking for specific student, arrested by police officer assigned at school meeting
column27: 25YOM attempted to enter school looking for student he had on-going conflict with. Entry was blocked by 56YOM hall monitor. Hall minitor was shot by door. Police officer attending meeting at school heard the shots and arrested the shooter. School was locked down and then dismissed. Following arrest, police charged shooter with 1st degree murder for a seperate 2016 incident.

column24: Student fired shot as school opened then fled the scene. Reported attempt to kill ex girlfriend.
column27: 16YOM student fired a handgun (single shot) in the school hallway, dropped the weapon, then fled the school. Note in student's pocket said he intended to kill his ex girlfriend (Valentine's Day). Caught by law enforcement as he was running from the scene. Police report shooter had been questioned 9 months ago when he said voices were telling him to commit a shooting at the school.

column24: Neighbors met at school to talk about on going dispute over parking, argument lead to shooting
column27: 31YOM shot and killed 46YOM (assistant principal at another Aurora school) during ongoing dispute about a parking space. Both men lived across the street from the school. Two men agreed to meet at the school to discuss the dispute and it escalated into a shooting. Shooting occured on Sunday of holiday weekened. Classes at school were disrupted and students received counciling. Shooter called police and said he shot neighbor then surrendered to police following shooting.

column24: Student shot by other student in the school gym. Police said shooting was targeted.
column27: 17YOM student shot by unidentied male student in the school gym. 30 other staff and students were in the gym during the time of the shooting. Suspect fled and was arrested off campus by police. Handgun was recovered. Active shooter plan at school was used and policed conducted room by room sweep. School has metal detectors at front door but does not "pat down" students entering.

column24: Shooting between police and suspect across from school. Bullet his cars in school parking lot and building.
column27: 26YOM shooter lived directly across street from school. Police were called for reported shots fired at 1:30 PM at home between mother and shooter. School officials heard shots and locked down. At 3:15, shooter fired multiple shots at police and was then shot by officers. Bullets hit vehicles in the school parking lot and the school building. School remained locked down until crime scene was cleared. Students were outside at the time of the shooting and heard gun shots before taking cover in the building. No students or school staff were injured.

column24: Student asked to leave classroom and commit suicide in school auditorium
column27: 17YOF asked to go to the bathroom. About 10 minutes later, a gun shot was heard and her body was found by the school security officer and nurse in the school auditorium. School was locked down for 30 minutes then dismissed 2 hours later. Classes cancelled the following day.

column24: Gun discharged in teacher's pocket
column27: Gun discharged in teachers pocket inside of classroom. Gun was illegally carried by 74YOM substitute teacher. One student had minor injury from bullet fragment. Teacher was arrested.

column24: Student brought a handgun to school and shot a targeted classmate
column27: 14YOM student brought a concealed handgun to school and shot a targeted a male classmate with whom he had a dispute over the weekend. Suspect ditched the weapon in a bush on school property and fled. School went on lockdown and victim was taken to the hospital. Suspect was apprehended by SROs shortly after. A student-witness reported that suspect told victim that he was not going to shoot him but he did.

column24: Shots fired nearby struck the school and broke a classroom window
column27: Several shots were fired at the intersection near the school. Several bullets struck the occupied school building and broke a classroom window. No students were injured. No suspect identified (several detained).

column22: Unknown if Subdued Surrendered or Fled
column24: Accidental discharge of school employees handgun grazed student.
column27: School employee's handgun discharged injuring a 10YO student. Employee was not authorized to have the gun at the school. Shooting was not reported to police and school was not locked down. Police were notified of the incident 7 days later and the employee was terminated.

column24: Shots fired at unoccupied school building
column27: Teacher on Monday morning found spent casings and bullet holes in a portable classroom at the start of the school day. Shooting had occured over the weekend. Students were no in the classroom and were moved to another location for the remainder of the day.

column24: Student shot himself in the school bathroom
column27: 7th grade student shot himself in the bathroom of the school. No other students or staff were injured. School was locked down for 1 hour and then dismissed.

column24: Student shot himself in the school bathroom
column27: 14YOM student shot himself in the school bathroom. No other students or staff injured. School shooting was reported by law enforcement. School locked down and then dismissed.

column24: BB/pellet gun projectiles shot from outside of the school hit 10 students
column27: Elementary school students were playing outside in the yard and 10 were hit by BB/pellet gun projectiles, reportedly coming from a wooded area outside the school property. Victim sufferend minor injuries and were taken to the hospital. The school district claimed there was noone trying to get in the building and staff and other students were not at risk. A student who was in the cafeteria allegedly heard reports for an active shooter and a teacher asked the janitor to lock the doors and close the blinds.

column24: Parent fired at school bus after argument with bus driver
column27: Car pulled in front of school bus and parent started argument with the bus driver. The car then pulled along the side of the bus and the passenger fired multiple shots at the bus then drove off. No students or the bus driver were injured.

column24: Student fired gun in classroom, fled classroom, hid gun, and was arrested by SRO
column27: Student fired gun in classroom. May have been showing gun to other students. Shooter fled classroom and hid the gun in another classroom. Shooter was detained by SRO. School locked down. No injuries.

column24: SRO's gun discharged in school cafeteria during the school day
column27: Armed SRO was standing against wall near lunch line when duty weapon discharged striking wall. Multiple students were standing nearby in the lunch line.

column24: Two students planned attack on school, subdued by other students and law enforcement
column27: Two suspects - current students - 18YOM and a juvenile F, entered the school armed with handguns and engaged students at two separate locations. The male suspect reportedly shouted to students not to move, several students charged at the suspect, one of them was shot dead. Some students used the time to get away from the room. 8 people were injured, 4 in critical condition. Male suspect reportedly took the gun out of a what looked like a guitar case and started shooting. The assigned armed guard at the school confronted the male suspect. After a struggle, both suspects were soon arrested by poilice who arrived within 2 minutes. People living nearby and students helped wounded victims. One of the students reported that the male suspect had talked about causing harm and sadness but was never taken seriously. Initial information does not show if female suspect fired her weapon.  Police inspected male suspect's home and vehicle. Allegedly, there was a sign in the back of the car reding "Fuck Society". The female suspect was allegedly bullied, she is possibly a transgender or born male but identifying as a female.
column38: Devon Erickson, Maya Elizabeth McKinney (aka Alec McKinney)

column24: Student wearing a trench coat walked into classroom with a shotgun. Tackled by football coach.
column27: Student wearing a trench coat walked into classroom with a shotgun. Tackled by football coach. No shots fired. Suspect arrested. School locked down and dismissed.

column24: Student shot in parking lot after football game.
column27: 16YOM student shot in the school parking lot following a football game (critical condition). Police said the shooting was targeted and gang involvement is possible. Shooter fled but police reported strong leads on suspects. 6 school resource officers were working during the time of the shooting.
